solution_line_template: The combined cost of the bananas, bread, and milk was {bananas_cost} + {bread_cost} + {milk_cost} = $<<{bananas_cost}+{bread_cost}+{milk_cost}={combined_cost}>>{combined_cost}.

The difference between this and the total is the cost of the apples, which must have therefore cost Olivia {total_cost} - {combined_cost} = $<<{total_cost}-{combined_cost}={apples_cost}>>{apples_cost}.
